resources.string: 1) How difficult was it to find what you were looking for?
2) How would you rate the quality of the service?
3)How would you rate the cleanliness of the store?
4) How would you rate the atmosphere of the store?
5) Would you recommend this store to friends and family?
1) How would you rate the quality of the food?
2) How would you rate the quality of the service?
3)How would you rate the cleanliness of the restaurant?
4) How would you rate the atmosphere of the restaurant?
5) Would you recommend this restaurant to friends and family?
